title: PaMAGIC
image-alt: screen shot of the website www.pamagic.org
teaser: I led a team in rebuilding the organization's website on the Drupal CMS platform.  I continue to serve as the website administrator.

title: McKinney Party of 5
image-alt: screen shot of the website www.mckinneypartyof5.life
teaser: I designed and built a family blogging website using a Jamstack approach.  The site is built using Jekyll, delivered through CloudFlare, and utilizes the Bootstrap framework.
